Html: I know, ya'll are hammering at the code as I type this, but for the sake of sanity, is there an ETA on the table for Rawr4 beta?  Patch is coming out tomorrow, but then ya'll already knew that :P
I really feel for ya all on this one. Such a major change in the code calculations...oh my.

Something to remember.  Rawr4 is targeting level 85, not 4.0.1 level 80 content.  So even if we did ship tomorrow with the 401 patch, it would not do you any good since there's 5 levels of content to sort through.  Abilities that may be fundamental to end-game are not able to be factored into the rotations and such.
So, basically Rawr 2 and 3 are effectively dead with the new patch?

hoedown wrote:

Essentially yes. Welcome to Cataclysm.

*sigh* Yeah, I knew this day would come...guess I gotta go back to using spreadsheets and calculators to figure out the best way to reforge and gear up stuffs to be hit and expertise capped.  It's all good though.
or you could just not care til you are85...
I was wondering if rawr 4.0 "at level 80" would be better than rawr 2; both will have issues, but I would have imagined that 4.0 would be "closer".  Anyone have a guess?
Neither will be of use to you. Just make frelling intelligent decisions. Min/maxing is not needed right now.
Any chance of getting the RAWR 4 alpha up in EJ for try out?  Would be nice to see and try even if it were full of mistakes.

Give the RAWR guy's n Girl's a beak, I just wish I had the coding knowledge to help out - roll on lvl 85 - will look forward to RAWR 4 :o)

Wormtail

wormstown wrote:
